gameDetails.name: Tiny Epic Western: Kickstarter Deluxe Promo Pack
gameDetails.description: This promo pack includes 4 new Boss Cards: the Lawman, the Bounty Hunter, the Apothecary, and the Entertainer. It also includes 2 additional Bullet Dice (Blue and Green) and a plastic windowed Wanted Card that lays over the Boss Cards for a more thematic immersion.
